tests.name: View Receipts List
tests.notes: Receipts page shows 3 receipts with images, store names, dates, amounts. Summary stats displayed.

tests.name: View Receipt Details
tests.notes: Clicking receipt opens detail panel with store, date, amount and Edit button

tests.name: Edit Receipt Form
tests.notes: Edit page shows form with store name, amount (spinbutton), date picker, notes field

tests.name: Upload Page Accessible
tests.notes: Upload page renders with receipt upload functionality

issues.description: Delete functionality not tested - would need to verify delete confirmation dialog
